verses.verse: You also, son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> take <WH3947> you a tile, <WH3843> and lay <WH5414> it before <WH6440> you, and portray <WH2710> on it the city, <WH5892> even <WH853> Jerusalem: <WH3389>

And lay <WH5414> siege <WH4692> against <WH5921> it, and build <WH1129> a fort <WH1785> against <WH5921> it, and cast <WH8210> a mount <WH5550> against <WH5921> it; set <WH5414> the camp <WH4264> also against <WH5921> it, and set <WH7760> battering rams <WH3733> against <WH5921> it round <WH5439> about.

Moreover take <WH3947> you to you an iron <WH1270> pan, <WH4227> and set <WH5414> it for a wall <WH7023> of iron <WH1270> between <WH996> you and the city: <WH5892> and set <WH3559> your face <WH6440> against <WH413> it, and it shall be besieged, <WH4692> and you shall lay siege <WH6696> against <WH5921> it. This <WH1931> shall be a sign <WH226> to the house <WH1004> of Israel. <WH3478>

Lie <WH7901> you also on your left <WH8042> side, <WH6654> and lay <WH7760> the iniquity <WH5771> of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> on it: according to the number <WH4557> of the days <WH3117> that you shall lie <WH7901> on it you shall bear <WH5375> their iniquity. <WH5771>

For I have laid <WH5414> on you the years <WH8141> of their iniquity, <WH5771> according to the number <WH4557> of the days, <WH3117> three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> and ninety <WH8673> days: <WH3117> so shall you bear <WH5375> the iniquity <WH5771> of the house <WH1004> of Israel. <WH3478>

And when you have accomplished <WH3615> them, lie <WH7901> again <WH8145> on <WH5921> your right <WH3227> side, <WH6654> and you shall bear <WH5375> the iniquity <WH5771> of the house <WH1004> of Judah <WH3063> forty <WH705> days: <WH3117> I have appointed <WH5414> you each day <WH3117> for a year. <WH8141>

Therefore you shall set <WH3559> your face <WH6440> toward <WH413> the siege <WH4692> of Jerusalem, <WH3389> and your arm <WH2220> shall be uncovered, <WH2834> and you shall prophesy <WH5012> against <WH5921> it.

And, behold, <WH2009> I will lay bands <WH5688> on you, and you shall not turn <WH2015> you from one side <WH6654> to another, till <WH5704> you have ended <WH3615> the days <WH3117> of your siege. <WH4692>

Take <WH3947> you also to you wheat, <WH2406> and barley, <WH8184> and beans, <WH6321> and lentils, <WH5742> and millet, <WH1764> and fitches, <WH3698> and put <WH5414> them in one <WH259> vessel, <WH3627> and make <WH6213> you bread <WH3899> thereof, according to the number <WH4557> of the days <WH3117> that you shall lie <WH7901> on your side, <WH6654> three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> and ninety <WH8673> days <WH3117> shall you eat <WH398> thereof.
And your meat <WH3978> which <WH834> you shall eat <WH398> shall be by weight, <WH4946> twenty <WH6242> shekels <WH8255> a day: <WH3117> from time <WH6256> to time <WH6256> shall you eat <WH398> it.
You shall drink <WH8354> also water <WH4325> by measure, <WH4884> the sixth <WH8345> part of an hin: <WH1969> from time <WH6256> to time <WH6256> shall you drink. <WH8354>
And you shall eat <WH398> it as barley <WH8184> cakes, <WH5692> and you shall bake <WH5746> it with dung <WH1561> that comes <WH6627> out of man, <WH120> in their sight. <WH5869>

And the LORD <WH3068> said, <WH559> Even <WH3602> thus <WH3602> shall the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> eat <WH398> their defiled <WH2931> bread <WH3899> among the Gentiles, <WH1471> where <WH834> <WH8033> I will drive <WH5080> them.

Then said <WH559> I, Ah <WH162> Lord <WH136> GOD! <WH3069> behold, <WH2009> my soul <WH5315> has not been polluted: <WH2930> for from my youth <WH5271> up even till <WH5704> now <WH6258> have I not eaten <WH398> of that which dies <WH5038> of itself, or is torn <WH2966> in pieces; neither <WH3808> came <WH935> there abominable <WH6292> flesh <WH1320> into my mouth. <WH6310>

Then he said <WH559> to me, See, <WH7200> I have given <WH5414> you cow's <WH1241> dung <WH6832> for man's <WH120> dung, <WH1561> and you shall prepare <WH6213> your bread <WH3899> therewith. <WH5921>

Moreover he said <WH559> to me, Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> behold, <WH2005> I will break <WH7665> the staff <WH4294> of bread <WH3899> in Jerusalem: <WH3389> and they shall eat <WH398> bread <WH3899> by weight, <WH4948> and with care; <WH1674> and they shall drink <WH8354> water <WH4325> by measure, <WH4884> and with astonishment: <WH8078>
That they may want <WH2637> bread <WH3899> and water, <WH4325> and be astonished <WH8074> one <WH376> with another, <WH251> and consume <WH4743> away for their iniquity. <WH5771>
